definitions.definition: A serious criminal offense , which, under United States federal law , is punishable by a term of imprisonment of not less than one year or by the death penalty in the most serious offenses .
definitions.label_groups: law , criminology , US , historical in UK

main_definition: ( law , criminology , US , historical in UK ) A serious criminal offense , which, under United States federal law , is punishable by a term of imprisonment of not less than one year or by the death penalty in the most serious offenses .
